events.name: Isobar Create 32 Hackathon 2013
events.about:
What is Isobar Create32?

It’s a 32-hour hackathon that challenges developers in Singapore to create innovative new apps featuring Near Field Communication (NFC) technology. Whether you’re a developer, a designer or simply someone with great ideas, you’re welcome to take part. Only 60 spots are available on a first-come first-served basis though, so sign-up today!

Why you should join

  • Receive pointers from the sharpest minds in the industry
  • Team-up and exchange ideas with other like-minded individuals
  • Test out your ideas on the latest NFC technology
  • Not to forget, there are lots of great prizes to be won!

Signing up as a group?

Please register all members [up to a maximum 3] together in one session. 

Not currently in a group?

Don’t worry, just sign up now and we’ll team you up with others on the day itself!
